channel.title: Portfolio website for Jessica DAI
channel.description: Recent content on Portfolio website for Jessica DAI

item.title: Hi there! nice to meet you:)
item.description: I am originally from Zhengzhou, China and I like traveling, embracing different cultures and learning languages, so I have studied in several different locations like Hong Kong, South Korea and Shanghai. In my spare time, I am an art fanatic and have a passion for fashion design. I not-so-secretly stalk Vera Wang’s wedding dress designs, because I believe that looking at beautiful things can make our lives a little brighter.

item.title: Resume_me
item.description: Please check out more about my professional experience!

item.title: Risk-Return of DJIA stocks
item.description: Returns of financial stocks Next, let’s choose the Dow Jones Industrial Average (DJIA) stocks and their ticker symbols and download some data. Besides the thirty stocks that make up the DJIA, we will also add SPY which is an SP500 ETF (Exchange Traded Fund). We will use the rvest package to scrape the Wikipedia page for the constituents of DJIA djia_url <- "https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dow_Jones_Industrial_Average" #get tables that exist on URL tables <- djia_url %>% read_html() %>% html_nodes(css="table") # parse HTML tables into a dataframe called djia.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
